channel.title: 474 skill & emote tab bundle (through cache)
channel.description:
This is the 474 skill interface and 474 emote interface recreated in lin's interface editor(very easy to use).
[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/6860/emotetab.gif[/img]
No hardcoding required, all sprites and interfaces are packed into the cache. :D
If you would like to use these interfaces, just download this file and follow the instructions in the readme file inside.
[url=http://uppit.com/1s84zlgxg64h/Updated_interfaces.rar]Updated Interfaces Download[/url]
**Do not use these interfaces if you are using the following: Sir Harry's 474 options interface Hardcoded Lunar Interface New equipment tab
the hard coding will interfere with these interfaces.
You will need tom's cache suite if you are going to use this. The suite can be located here: [url=http://www.nuke-net.com/?page_id=5]Tom's Cache Suite[/url]
Enjoy, I will probably look into re creating the 474 prayer and option interfaces soon.

item.title: 474 skill & emote tab bundle (through cache)
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Destruction, post:5, topic:361793”]Thank you for this. BTW, would you like to work on more interfaces together? I’m pretty good with Lin’s Interface Editor/Maker also.

P.S. your tooltip boxes are the wrong color. Make them 255, 255, 128.

EDIT: It’s this color in case you can’t find it:

EDIT2: I fixed all the colors for the tooltips for both the emote interface and the skill interface for you in case you’re too lazy to fix them & for anyone who wants to just download this file instead of fixing it themselves or waiting for Badger41 to fix it.

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

i personally think the color i used looks better than that yellowish color, the color i used is on the web tab, its like maconsin or something.

Yea id be happy to work on interfaces with you, add my msn.

Read full topic
